page.title: 12LIFE STYLES IN SANDBACH
page.content: THE{MOTEL}IS SITUATED HALF A MILE FROM JUNCTION 17 OF THE M6{MOTORWAY}.THE MOTEL IS CONVENIENT BECAUSE IT IS CLOSE TO THE M6 AND HAS GOOD CAR PARKING FACILITIES. IT IS A MODERN BUILDING,PLEASING TO THE EYE AND IN A QUIET SPOT NEAR TO THE TOWN CENTRE. INSIDE THERE IS A BAR AND A{ {RESTAURANT.}THE RESTAURANT AND BAR ARE OPEN TO NON-RESIDENTS.EACH ROOM HAS A T.V. ,TELEPHONE AND EN-SUITE BATHROOM. THE MOTEL IS SUITABLY FURNISHED FOR BUSINESS MEN WHO HAVE TO MAKE OVER NIGHT STOPS.ELEVEN OUT OF TWENTY FOUR PEOPLE COME BACK REGULARY.THE RESIDENTS USUALLY STAY FOR A SHORT TIME AND HAVE COME ALONG WAY. THE BUSINESS MEN USE THE MOTEL AS A BREAK IN THEIR JOURNEY AND NOT MANY STAY FOR PLEASURE ALTHOUGH THE MOTEL IS USED FOR{TOURISM.}
